title: Feature Operations Tool
description: Execute Spec Kitty feature workflow operations (specify, plan, tasks, implement, review, accept)

project_path.description: Absolute path to Spec Kitty project root directory (must contain .kittify/)

feature_slug.description: Feature identifier (e.g., '099-mcp-server-for-conversational-spec-kitty-workflow'), required for most operations except specify

work_package_id.description: Work package ID (for implement operation, e.g., 'WP01')

session_id.description: Session ID for resuming multi-turn conversations (UUID)
